This is considered the highest steel arch bridge
in Vietnam with a distance from the bridge deck
to the top of the arch from 40 to 67
m. Kinh Bridge  Duong Vuong has a length of 1232
m with a total investment of 1926 billion VND globally and has
25 spans, of which the main bridge includes five
main spans using steel arches combined with
pre-stressed reinforced concrete beams and
suspension cable system.  Combining load bearing
with reinforced concrete beam system, this is
an important bridge forming a
closed traffic network between the
Bac Duong and South Duong areas of Bac Ninh province
connecting the region with the
Red River Delta provinces.  At the same time, the bridge connecting

of the plant  Installed on saline land

This ground was once inhabited by

detour. More exposure to
light at night, especially blue light
from electronic device screens can
increase the risk of
mental disorders such as anxiety and
post-traumatic stress disorder. This is a
study published by Australian scientists.
Recently, experts  Researchers conducted the
largest study of 86,000 people to
date, and the results showed that among
those exposed to
high levels of light at night, the risk of depression increased by 30 PH, while those who were exposed to high levels of light at night had an increased risk of depression by
30 PH.  People
exposed to higher levels of light during
the day had a 20-minute reduction in depression risk.
Notably, this effect did not depend
on physical activity demographics or
the season of the year. Scientists say that
people  Modern people are exposed to too much
electric light at night and
this changes the body's biological mechanism
leading to health effects.
